name: NON FLOW ITEMS
description: Non resource flow items requested on DAC table 1

name: GUARANTEES AND OTHER UNFUNDED CONTINGENT LIABILITIES
INTEREST SUBSIDY
description: Subsidies to soften the terms of private export credits, or loans or credits by the banking sector.

name: CAPITAL SUBSCRIPTION
description: Payments to multilateral agencies in the form of notes and similar instruments, unconditionally cashable at sight by the recipient institutions.

name: LOAN
description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

name: EQUITY AND SHARES IN COLLECTIVE INVESTMENT VEHICLES
DEBT RELIEF
description: Debt cancellations, debt conversions, debt rescheduling within or outside the framework of the Paris Club.

name: INVESTMENT
description: Investment made by a private entity resident in a reporting country to acquire or add to a lasting interest(1) in an enterprise in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients.

name: BONDS
description: Acquisition of bonds issued by developing countries.
